{
    public static class {ModelType}Extensions
    {
        public static DOMAIN.{ModelType} ToDomain(this SERVICE.{ModelType} svcModel)
        {
            var domainModel = AcMapper.Map<SERVICE.{ModelType}, DOMAIN.{ModelType}>(svcModel)
                .AdditionalOperations(svcModel);
            return domainModel;
        }

        public static DOMAIN.{ModelType} AdditionalOperations(this DOMAIN.{ModelType} dmModel, SERVICE.{ModelType} svcModel)
        {
            DomainTransformExtensions.NullifyWhiteSpaceStrings(dmModel);
            return dmModel;
        }

        public static void DefineMappings()
        {
            AcMapper.CreateMap<SERVICE.{ModelType}, DOMAIN.{ModelType}>(){CreateMapExtensions}
                .IgnoreSpecifiedProperties();
